sentences.sContent: Compliments of the season! (= for Christmas or the New Year)
sentences.sCn: 谨致节日的祝贺！（圣诞节或新年时的贺词）

sentences.sContent: She complimented him on his excellent German.

synos.tran: 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺

phrases.pCn: 言不由衷(或挖苦人)的恭维话

remMethod.val: com ＋ pli(倍， 重) ＋ ment → 超过事实几倍的评价 → 恭维

trans.tranOther: polite words or good wishes, especially when used to express praise and admiration
to say something nice to someone in order to praise them
